Smooth Minimization (Nesterov, 2004) -- Section 04 -- Part 10

open scoped NNRealopen scoped Pointwiseopen scoped BigOperatorsnamespace Section04Part10open variationalInequality

Image under negation is scalar multiplication by -1 : -1 on : Type.

lemma image_neg_eq_smul (s : Set ) : (fun x => -x) '' s = (-1 : ) s := by ext x; constructor rintro y, hy, rfl exact y, hy, by simp rintro y, hy, rfl exact y, hy, by simp

Push a negation through SupSet.sSup.{u_1} { : Type u_1} [self : SupSet ] : Set sSup for subsets of : Type.

lemma sSup_image_neg_eq_neg_sInf (s : Set ) : sSup ((fun x => -x) '' s) = - sInf s := by have hsup := Real.sSup_smul_of_nonpos (a := (-1 : )) (by linarith) s simpa [image_neg_eq_smul] using hsup

Push a negation through InfSet.sInf.{u_1} { : Type u_1} [self : InfSet ] : Set sInf for subsets of : Type.

lemma sInf_image_neg_eq_neg_sSup (s : Set ) : sInf ((fun x => -x) '' s) = - sSup s := by have h := Real.sInf_smul_of_nonpos (a := (-1 : )) (by linarith) s simpa [image_neg_eq_smul] using h
namespace variationalInequality

A saddle point with bounded images forces the minimax equality by showing both sides are zero.

lemma minimax_eq_of_saddlePoint {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace E] (Q : Set E) (B : E Module.Dual E) {w0 : E} (hw0 : w0 Q) (hgap_le : v Q, B v (w0 - v) 0) (hgap_ge : w Q, 0 B w0 (w - w0)) (hbdAbove : w Q, BddAbove ((fun v => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) (hbdBelow : v Q, BddBelow ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) : sInf ((fun w => sSup ((fun v => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q) = sSup ((fun v => sInf ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q) := by classical set S : Set := (fun w => sSup ((fun v => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q set T : Set := (fun v => sInf ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q have hS_nonempty : S.Nonempty := by refine sSup ((fun v => B v (w0 - v)) '' Q), ?_ exact w0, hw0, rfl have hT_nonempty : T.Nonempty := by refine sInf ((fun w => B w0 (w - w0)) '' Q), ?_ exact w0, hw0, rfl have hS_nonneg : x S, (0 : ) x := by intro x hx rcases hx with w, hw, rfl have hbd := hbdAbove w hw simpa [variationalInequalityGap] using (gap_nonneg_of_mem (Q := Q) (B := B) (w := w) hw hbd) have hS_inf_ge : (0 : ) sInf S := by refine le_csInf hS_nonempty ?_ intro x hx exact hS_nonneg x hx have hS_bddBelow : BddBelow S := by refine 0, ?_ intro x hx exact hS_nonneg x hx have hsup_w0_le : sSup ((fun v => B v (w0 - v)) '' Q) 0 := by have hne : ((fun v => B v (w0 - v)) '' Q).Nonempty := by refine B w0 (w0 - w0), ?_ exact w0, hw0, by simp refine csSup_le hne ?_ intro y hy rcases hy with v, hv, rfl exact hgap_le v hv have hS_inf_le : sInf S 0 := by have hmem : sSup ((fun v => B v (w0 - v)) '' Q) S := by exact w0, hw0, rfl exact le_trans (csInf_le hS_bddBelow hmem) hsup_w0_le have hS_eq : sInf S = 0 := by exact le_antisymm hS_inf_le hS_inf_ge have hT_le_elem : x T, x 0 := by intro x hx rcases hx with v, hv, rfl have hbd := hbdBelow v hv have hmem : (0 : ) ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q) := by exact v, hv, by simp exact csInf_le hbd hmem have hT_le : sSup T 0 := by refine csSup_le hT_nonempty ?_ intro x hx exact hT_le_elem x hx have hT_bddAbove : BddAbove T := by refine 0, ?_ intro x hx exact hT_le_elem x hx have hT_inf_w0_ge : (0 : ) sInf ((fun w => B w0 (w - w0)) '' Q) := by have hne : ((fun w => B w0 (w - w0)) '' Q).Nonempty := by refine B w0 (w0 - w0), ?_ exact w0, hw0, by simp refine le_csInf hne ?_ intro y hy rcases hy with w, hw, rfl exact hgap_ge w hw have hT_sup_ge : (0 : ) sSup T := by have hmem : sInf ((fun w => B w0 (w - w0)) '' Q) T := by exact w0, hw0, rfl have hle : sInf ((fun w => B w0 (w - w0)) '' Q) sSup T := le_csSup hT_bddAbove hmem exact le_trans hT_inf_w0_ge hle have hT_eq : sSup T = 0 := by exact le_antisymm hT_le hT_sup_ge have hmain : sInf S = sSup T := hS_eq.trans hT_eq.symm simpa [S, T] using hmain

A VI solution yields a saddle point for the gap payoff, hence the minimax equality.

lemma minimax_eq_of_exists_VI_solution {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace E] [FiniteDimensional E] (Q : Set E) ( : E [] Module.Dual E) (b : Module.Dual E) (hmono : h : E, 0 ( h) h) (hex : w0, IsVariationalInequalitySolution Q b w0) (hbdAbove : w Q, BddAbove ((fun v => ( v + b) (w - v)) '' Q)) (hbdBelow : v Q, BddBelow ((fun w => ( v + b) (w - v)) '' Q)) : sInf ((fun w => sSup ((fun v => ( v + b) (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q) = sSup ((fun v => sInf ((fun w => ( v + b) (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q) := by classical rcases hex with w0, hVI have hw0 : w0 Q := hVI.1 have hgap_ge : w Q, 0 ( w0 + b) (w - w0) := hVI.2 have hgap_le : v Q, ( v + b) (w0 - v) 0 := by simpa using (VI_implies_pointwise_gap_le (Q := Q) ( := ) (b := b) hmono (wstar := w0) hVI) exact minimax_eq_of_saddlePoint (Q := Q) (B := fun v => v + b) (w0 := w0) hw0 hgap_le hgap_ge hbdAbove hbdBelow
end variationalInequality

Reformulate the inner max by flipping the sign.

lemma variationalInequality_sign_flip {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace E] (Q : Set E) (B : E Module.Dual E) : sSup ((fun v => sInf ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) '' Q) = - sInf ((fun v => sSup ((fun w => B v (v - w)) '' Q)) '' Q) := by classical let F : E := fun v => sInf ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q) let G : E := fun v => sSup ((fun w => B v (v - w)) '' Q) have hneg : v, G v = - F v := by intro v have himage : (fun w => B v (v - w)) '' Q = (fun t => -t) '' ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q) := by ext x; constructor rintro w, hw, rfl refine B v (w - v), ?_, ?_ exact w, hw, rfl have h : v - w = -(w - v) := by abel symm calc B v (v - w) = B v (-(w - v)) := by rw [h] _ = - B v (w - v) := by simp rintro x, w, hw, rfl, rfl refine w, hw, ?_ have h : v - w = -(w - v) := by abel calc B v (v - w) = B v (-(w - v)) := by rw [h] _ = - B v (w - v) := by simp calc G v = sSup ((fun w => B v (v - w)) '' Q) := by rfl _ = sSup ((fun t => -t) '' ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) := by rw [himage] _ = - sInf ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q) := by simpa using (sSup_image_neg_eq_neg_sInf ((fun w => B v (w - v)) '' Q)) _ = - F v := by rfl have himage_outer : G '' Q = (fun t => -t) '' (F '' Q) := by ext x; constructor rintro v, hv, rfl refine F v, ?_, ?_ exact v, hv, rfl simpa [F, G] using (hneg v).symm rintro x, v, hv, rfl, rfl exact v, hv, by simpa [F, G] using (hneg v) have h' : sSup (F '' Q) = - sInf ((fun x => -x) '' (F '' Q)) := by have h := sInf_image_neg_eq_neg_sSup (F '' Q) linarith [h] calc sSup (F '' Q) = - sInf ((fun x => -x) '' (F '' Q)) := h' _ = - sInf (G '' Q) := by simp [himage_outer]

Unfold the smoothed max for the sum-of-abs objective into a separable quadratic sum.

lemma sumAbs_smoothed_unfold {E1 : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E1] [NormedSpace E1] (m : ) (a : Fin m E1 L[] ) (b : Fin m ) (A : E1 L[] ((Fin m ) L[] )) (phihat : (Fin m ) ) ( : ) (hA : x u, A x u = j, u j * a j x) (hphihat : u, phihat u = j, b j * u j) (x : E1) : let Q2 : Set (Fin m ) := { u | j, |u j| 1 } let d2 : (Fin m ) := fun u => (1 / 2 : ) * j : Fin m, a j * (u j) ^ (2 : ) let f : E1 := SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 f x = sSup ((fun u : Fin m => Finset.univ.sum (fun j : Fin m => (u j) * (a j x - b j) - (1 / 2 : ) * * a j * (u j) ^ (2 : ))) '' Q2) := by classical intro Q2 d2 f dsimp [f, SmoothedMaxFunction, d2] -- rewrite the linear terms and distribute the penalty over the sum have hfun : (fun u : Fin m => A x u - ( j : Fin m, b j * u j) = j : Fin m, u j * (a j x - b j) := by calc ( j : Fin m, u j * a j x) - ( j : Fin m, b j * u j) = j : Fin m, (u j * a j x - b j * u j) := by simp [Finset.sum_sub_distrib] _ = j : Fin m, u j * (a j x - b j) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring have hpen : (1 / 2 : ) * * ( j : Fin m, a j * (u j) ^ (2 : )) = j : Fin m, (1 / 2 : ) * * a j * (u j) ^ (2 : ) := by -- pull the scalar into the sum calc (1 / 2 : ) * * ( j : Fin m, a j * (u j) ^ (2 : )) = ( j : Fin m, (1 / 2 : ) * * (a j * (u j) ^ (2 : ))) := by simp [Finset.mul_sum, mul_left_comm, mul_assoc] _ = j : Fin m, (1 / 2 : ) * * a j * (u j) ^ (2 : ) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring have hpen' : (2 : ) * * ( j : Fin m, a j * (u j) ^ (2 : )) = j : Fin m, (2 : ) * * a j * (u j) ^ (2 : ) := by simpa [one_div] using hpen -- assemble the sum of terms calc A x u - Split the separable quadratic supremum over Unknown identifier `Q2`Q2 into coordinatewise suprema.
